name: Secret Shine
info:
• 别名: Amelia's Dream
  • 生日: 1991年
  • 成员: Scott Purnell
  • 成员: Jamie Gingell
  • 成员: Kathryn Smith
  • 成员: Dean Purnell
  • 成员: Tom Adams
detail: Secret Shine are a British shoegazing band formed in the early 1990s, who were signed to Sarah Records. Although early releases with both Sarah and A Turntable Friend followed the more linear Sarah pop stylings, the 1992 release Untouched broke into unapologetic shoegazing territory, earning the band many comparisons with Slowdive and My Bloody Valentine.
